tasks.title: Commander Dashboard and Navbar Mobile Redesign
tasks.description: Redesign the Commander Dashboard and Navbar for Mobile perfection. Focus on simplicity while maintaining excellent UI and UX.

tasks.title: Finalize League View and Features
tasks.description: Complete the league view implementation and add all required features to make it production-ready.

tasks.title: Add LeagueList Vue Component
tasks.description: Create LeagueList.vue component in frontend/src/features/leagues/ that displays active leagues using the existing useLeaguesStore(). Include: league name, participant count, subscribe/unsubscribe buttons. Use Tailwind for styling. No backend changes required.

tasks.title: Replace Top Navbar with Bottom Navigation System
tasks.description: The current top navbar is obsolete. Replace it with an expanded bottom navigation system that provides better mobile UX and easier access to primary navigation items.
